operation.name: getMpiGroupPredefIds
operation.source-template: int getMpiGroupPredefIds_temp = (int)MUST_MPI_GROUP_EMPTY; int* RETURN = &getMpiGroupPredefIds_temp; int RETURN_LEN=1;

operation.name: comm2Group
comm2RemoteGroup
newIntercommContext
operation.source-template: int RETURN; { static int localNextContext = 1; int maxLocalContext = 0; int TEMP_myRank; MPI_Comm TEMP_local_comm = ARG0; MPI_Comm TEMP_peer_comm = ARG3; int TEMP_local_leader = ARG1; int TEMP_remote_leader = ARG2; int TEMP_tag = ARG4; /*TODO possibly validate TEMP_local_leader, TEMP_local_comm*/ PMPI_Reduce (&localNextContext, &maxLocalContext, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_MAX, TEMP_local_leader, TEMP_local_comm); localNextContext = maxLocalContext; PMPI_Comm_rank (TEMP_local_comm, &TEMP_myRank); if (TEMP_local_leader == TEMP_myRank) { MPI_Status status; /*TODO possibly validate TEMP_peer_comm, TEMP_remote_leader, TEMP_tag*/ PMPI_Sendrecv (&localNextContext, 1, MPI_INT, TEMP_remote_leader, TEMP_tag, &RETURN, 1, MPI_INT, TEMP_remote_leader, TEMP_tag, TEMP_peer_comm, &status); RETURN += localNextContext; localNextContext++; } PMPI_Bcast (&RETURN, 1, MPI_INT, TEMP_local_leader, TEMP_local_comm); }

operation.name: returnTagUb
operation.source-template: int RETURN = 0; int* RETURN_TEMP; int RETURN_flag = 0; PMPI_Attr_get(MPI_COMM_WORLD,MPI_TAG_UB,&RETURN_TEMP,&RETURN_flag); RETURN = *RETURN_TEMP;
